original_text: Oholah gave herself to them as a prostitute. She had sex with all the important young men of Assyria. She did these disgusting things with anyone that she wanted. She worshipped their idols and she made herself unclean.
korean_text: 그가 앗수르 사람들 가운데에 잘 생긴 그 모든 자들과 행음하고 누구를 연애하든지 그들의 모든 우상으로 자신을 더럽혔으며

sentences.original_text: Oholah gave herself to them as a prostitute
sentences.korean_translation: 오홀라는 그들에게 창녀가 되어 자신을 내어주었다

sentences.original_text: She had sex with all the important young men of Assyria
sentences.korean_translation: 그녀는 앗수르의 모든 중요한 젊은이들과 성관계를 가졌다
